data.title: Pope Francis: There is 'no point' going to church if you don't really believe in it. Pope speaks out against 'Christian parrots' who talk about religion but don't do good deeds, and says forgiveness can be difficult but is necessary in all cases, including domestic violence.
When asked what Trump could do to make sure German customers bought more American cars, Germany's deputy chancellor said: ‘Build better cars.’ | World news
World's eight richest people have same wealth as poorest 50%.
Northern Ireland government has collapsed. Election set for March.

Australia said it was "deeply disappointed" Japan had continued whaling in the Southern Ocean after anti-whaling activists published a photograph of a dead whale, and two days after Australian and Japanese leaders discussed the issue.
